content:
ServiceEndpointElement Class

In this Article

Represents a configuration element that provides settings for binding, contract, and address properties for a service endpoint, which is used to expose services. This class cannot be inherited.

Syntax

Declaration

public sealed class ServiceEndpointElement : System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
  • ServiceEndpointElement

Inherited Members

Constructors summary

ServiceEndpointElement()

Initializes a new instance of the ServiceEndpointElement class.
ServiceEndpointElement(Uri,String)

Initializes a new instance of the ServiceEndpointElement class with the specified endpoint address and contract type.

Properties summary

Address

Gets or sets a URI that contains the address of the endpoint.
BehaviorConfiguration

Gets or sets a string that contains the name of the behavior to be used for the endpoint.
Binding

Gets or sets a string that specifies the type of binding to use.
BindingConfiguration

Gets or sets a string that contains the binding name of the binding to use when the endpoint is instantiated.
BindingName

Gets or sets a string that defines the qualified name of the binding for definition export through WSDL.
BindingNamespace

Gets or sets a string that defines the qualified name of the namespace of the binding for definition export through WSDL.
Contract

Gets or sets a string that specifies which contract this endpoint is exposing.
EndpointConfiguration

Gets or sets the name of the standard endpoint that is set by the stem.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.Kind* property, which references to the additional configuration information of this standard endpoint. The same name must be defined in the StandardEndpointsSection.
Headers

Gets a collection of address headers.
Identity

Gets a configuration element that specifies the authentication of an endpoint by other endpoints exchanging messages with it.
IsSystemEndpoint

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this service endpoint is an infrastructure endpoint.
Kind

Gets or sets the type of standard endpoint applied. The type must be registered in the <extensions> section or in machine.config. If nothing is specified, a common service endpoint is created.
ListenUri

Gets or sets the URI at which the service endpoint listens.
ListenUriMode

Gets or sets a value that specifies how the transport treats the stem.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.ListenUri* provided for the service to listen on.
Name

Gets or sets the name of this configuration element.
Properties

Constructors

  • ServiceEndpointElement()

    Initializes a new instance of the ServiceEndpointElement class.

    public ServiceEndpointElement ();
  • ServiceEndpointElement(Uri,String)

    Initializes a new instance of the ServiceEndpointElement class with the specified endpoint address and contract type.

    public ServiceEndpointElement (Uri address, string contractType);

    Parameters

    • address
      Uri

      A URI that contains the address of the endpoint.

    • contractType
      String

      The contract this endpoint is exposing.

Properties

  • Address

    Gets or sets a URI that contains the address of the endpoint.

    public Uri Address { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Uri

      A URI that contains the address of the endpoint. The default is an empty string.

    Remarks

    The address can be specified as an absolute or relative address. If a relative address is provided, the host is expected to provide a base address appropriate for the transport scheme used in the binding. If an address is not configured, the base address is assumed to be the address for that endpoint.

  • BehaviorConfiguration

    Gets or sets a string that contains the name of the behavior to be used for the endpoint.

    public string BehaviorConfiguration { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of the behavior to be used for the endpoint.

  • Binding

    Gets or sets a string that specifies the type of binding to use.

    public string Binding { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The type of binding to use.

    Remarks

    The type must have a registered configuration section in order to be referenced. The type is registered by section name, rather than by the type name of the binding.

  • BindingConfiguration

    Gets or sets a string that contains the binding name of the binding to use when the endpoint is instantiated.

    public string BindingConfiguration { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The binding name of the binding to use when the endpoint is instantiated. The default is an empty string.

    Remarks

    The binding name must be in scope when the endpoint is defined.

  • BindingName

    Gets or sets a string that defines the qualified name of the binding for definition export through WSDL.

    public string BindingName { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The qualified name of the binding for definition export through WSDL. The default is an empty string.

  • BindingNamespace

    Gets or sets a string that defines the qualified name of the namespace of the binding for definition export through WSDL.

    public string BindingNamespace { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The qualified name of the namespace of the binding for definition export through WSDL. The default is an empty string.

  • Contract

    Gets or sets a string that specifies which contract this endpoint is exposing.

    public string Contract { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The contract this endpoint is exposing.

    Remarks

    The assembly must implement the contract type. If a service implementation implements a single contract type, then this property can be omitted.

  • EndpointConfiguration

    Gets or sets the name of the standard endpoint that is set by the stem.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.Kind* property, which references to the additional configuration information of this standard endpoint. The same name must be defined in the StandardEndpointsSection.

    public string EndpointConfiguration { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of the standard endpoint that is set by the stem.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.Kind* property.

  • Headers

    Gets a collection of address headers.

    public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AddressHeaderCollectionElement Headers { get; }

    Property Value

    • AddressHeaderCollectionElement

      A collection of address headers.

  • Identity

    Gets a configuration element that specifies the authentication of an endpoint by other endpoints exchanging messages with it.

    public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.IdentityElement Identity { get; }

    Property Value

    • IdentityElement

      The authentication of an endpoint by other endpoints exchanging messages with it.

  • IsSystemEndpoint

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this service endpoint is an infrastructure endpoint.

    public bool IsSystemEndpoint { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if this service endpoint is an infrastructure endpoint; otherwise, false.

  • Kind

    Gets or sets the type of standard endpoint applied. The type must be registered in the <extensions> section or in machine.config. If nothing is specified, a common service endpoint is created.

    public string Kind { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The type of standard endpoint applied.

  • ListenUri

    Gets or sets the URI at which the service endpoint listens.

    public Uri ListenUri { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Uri

      A Uri at which the service endpoint listens.

  • ListenUriMode

    Gets or sets a value that specifies how the transport treats the stem.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.ListenUri* provided for the service to listen on.

    public System.ServiceModel.Description.ListenUriMode ListenUriMode { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ListenUriMode

      A valid ListenUriMode value that specifies how the transport treats the stem.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.ListenUri* provided for the service to listen on.

  • Name

    Gets or sets the name of this configuration element.

    public string Name { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of this configuration element.

  • Properties
    protected override System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection Properties { get; }

    Property Value

    • ConfigurationPropertyCollection

      To be added.
